Detailed Description

template<class EOT>
class eoBestFitnessStat< EOT >

Best fitness of a population.

Fitness can be:

  • double
  • eoMinimizingFitness or eoMaximizingFitness
  • eoParetoFitness:

( For eoScalarFitnessAssembled look at eoAssembledFitnessStat )
